title: Kangana Ranaut shows how to spruce up your work wardrobe
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Kangana Ranaut (@team_kangana_ranaut) on Sep 28, 2019 at 4:35am PDT

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Kangana Ranaut (@team_kangana_ranaut) on Aug 14, 2019 at 10:05am PDT

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Kangana Ranaut (@team_kangana_ranaut) on Sep 6, 2018 at 3:40am PDT

Kangana Ranaut stole the show with her first appearance in the 2006-release, Gangster. Since then, her journey in the showbiz has been a rollercoaster ride. However, the actor has been able to establish her significant place with the choice of good movies and powerful performances. Her flair for keeping up with all things trendy is another reason behind her growing popularity. Here’s a look at her ultra-chic picks that can help you take your work wear fashion several notches higher.
description: Amp up your work wardrobe like Kangana Ranaut with bright colours, peppy prints, formal dresses, power suits, and more
